context.overview: Covu Agent Helper assists insurance agents in completing workflows faster by integrating task automation, AI guidance, and browser actions.
goals: Reduce time to complete claims and quotes.
Help fill web forms with context-aware AI assistance.
Integrate ChatGPT Atlas for intelligent task execution.

Step 2: Return to the main COI form page (the current page)
Step 3: Fill out the form with the following sample data

faq.How do I reset my Covu password?: Go to Account Settings → Security → Reset Password.
faq.How do I connect to carrier sites?: Use the 'External Portals' tab in Covu Portal.
faq.What is a Certificate of Insurance?: A Certificate of Insurance (COI) is a document that provides proof of insurance coverage. It's commonly required by clients, contractors, or landlords to verify that you have adequate insurance.
faq.How can ChatGPT help me fill out forms?: When you open this page in ChatGPT Atlas, you can ask for help. ChatGPT can navigate to external sites, gather information, and automatically fill out form fields with sample or real data.
